verbs.description: [V: philadelphia] [ARG0: sheraton] to host sensitivity training session after racial slur incident the sheraton hotel in center city has agreed to host a sensitivity training session for employees after a racial slur was directed at a hotel guest attending the japanese american citizens league jacl national convention the jacl told phillyvoice wednesday center city sheraton sheraton hotel phillyvoice philadelphia david inoue philadelphia convention visitors bureau jacl facebook japanese american citizens league national convention japanese american citizens league
